text: pinne ā matilinṟe kāryaṁ: at ā paṭṭaṇattile raṇṭ anāthakkuṭṭikaḷuṭētāṇ. atinaṭiyil avarkkāyi karutivecca oru nidhiyuṇṭ. avaruṭe pitāv nalleāru manuṣyanāyirunnu. atināl avariruvaruṁ prāyapūrttiyetti taṅṅaḷuṭe nidhi puṟatteṭukkaṇamenn ninṟe nāthan āgrahiccu. iteākkeyuṁ ninṟe nāthanṟe anugrahamatre. ñānenṟe svantaṁ hitamanusaricc ceytatalla iteānnuṁ. tāṅkaḷkku kṣamikkān kaḻiyātirunna kāryaṅṅaḷuṭe peāruḷitāṇ.”
